title: San Diego/Balboa Park-Hillcrest
name: San Diego Natural History Museum
price: $17 adults, $15 seniors, $12 teens/students/military, $11 children, free for children 2 and under
content: Like any natural history museum, this one has a lot of big dinosaur skeletons. Exhibits on the local ecology and geology are also prevalent throughout the museum, as well as a massive Foucault pendulum in the entrance hall. There are also many changing exhibitions and a giant-screen theater.
